alert.note: Alert for Saginaw; Shiawassee (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 05 at 2:40PM EDT until April 08 at 2:00AM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Detroit/Pontiac MI has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Michigan... Shiawassee River At Owosso affecting Saginaw and Shiawassee Counties. .Heavy rainfall from storms today has caused the river rise sharply this afternoon. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO EARLY SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Shiawassee River At Owosso. * WHEN...From this afternoon to early Saturday morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:15 PM EDT Wednesday the stage was 7.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 7.8 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage Friday evening. - Flood stage is 7.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
